# Required libraries

# Age distribution
```{r}
Telerobot_ages %>% ggdensity("Q_AGE", fill = "lightgray", facet.by = 'v')
```
```{r}
Telerobot_ages %>% 
#dplyr::filter(Finished == 1) %>%
dplyr::filter(!is.na(Q_ROBOT_STATEMENTS_1)) %>%
anova_test(Q_AGE ~ v)
```
